message.content:
We need to “calculate the final depreciation item” by identifying all transactions of type Depreciation and then summarizing (i.e. summing) their amounts.

Step 1. Look at the transactions:  
• There is one depreciation record on 2024‑01‑01 with an amount of 45,740.94  
• There is a second depreciation record on 2024‑02‑01 with an amount of 71,799.68000000001 (which we can round to 71,799.68)

Step 2. Sum the two amounts:  
  45,740.94 + 71,799.68 = 117,540.62

Thus, the final depreciation item that will appear in the income statement is 117,540.62.

The answer in the required JSON format is:

{
  "solution": {"Depreciation": "117540.62"}
}
